descriptions.content:
Description

Rituals in which the primary content is music, or ritual texts that focus on methods of making music or chanting.

Related Terms

gdangs yig (musical notation), tshogs skad gtong tshul bshad pa (instructions on how to chant communally)

Example Texts

  • gdan sa chen po dpal ldan sa skya'i phur pa sgrub mchog kyi skabs su tshogs skad gtong tshul gyi brda sbyor blo gsal sgo 'byed (W29410).
  • See also TBRC topic T1746 (gdangs yig)
